mapper.select: SELECT ( CASE kr.CNTRY_ID WHEN '113000002' THEN kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID WHEN '113000004' THEN aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID END ) AS ACCT_INTRL_ID FROM [mantas].[KDD_REVIEW] kr LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] ca on (kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID = ca.CUST_INTRL_ID AND kr.CNTRY_ID = '113000004') LEFT JOIN [mantas].[ACCT_ARC] aa on (ca.ACCT_INTRL_ID = aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID) WHERE CASE kr.CNTRY_ID WHEN '113000002' THEN kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID WHEN '113000004' THEN aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID END IS NOT NULL AND kr.REVIEW_ID = #{originalId}

select TOP 1
acc.ACCT_INTRL_ID accountId, acc.ACCT_DSPLY_NM accountName, acc.ACCT_TYPE1_CD type1, acc.ACCT_TYPE2_CD type2, acc.ACCT_STAT_DT registration, acc.MANTAS_ACCT_BUS_TYPE_CD ownerType, acc.ACCT_TAX_ID taxId, acc.TAX_WTHLD_CD taxCode, acc.ACCT_PEER_GRP_INTRL_ID householdGroupID, acc.ACCT_OPEN_DT openDate, acc.DATA_DUMP_DT updatedOn, acc.ACCT_STAT_CD status, acc.ACCT_STAT_DT statusEffective, acc.LAST_ACTVY_DT lastActivity, acc.DMCLD_BRCH_CD branch,
addr.ADDR_CNTRY_CD country, addr.ADDR_STATE_CD state, addr.ADDR_RGN_NM region, addr.ADDR_CITY_NM city,
addr.ADDR_STRT_LINE1_TX description,
acc.ACCT_EFCTV_RISK_NB effectiveRisk, acc.ACCT_BUS_RISK_NB businessRisk, acc.ACCT_LIST_RISK_NB watchListRisk, acc.ACCT_GEO_RISK_NB geographyRisk, acc.ACCT_CUST_RISK_NB customerRisk,
bal.NET_WRTH_AM accountNetworth,
bal.UNCOL_BAL_AM uncollectedBalance, bal.LAST_OVR_DRFT_NEG_BAL_DT lastOverdraftDate, bal.OVR_DRFT_BAL_AM lastOverdraftBalance, bal.LNG_OPTN_6MO_EXPRN_CT lastOverdraftEpisodes,
bal.LAST_OVR_DRFT_NEG_BAL_DT lastStatementDate, bal.ACCT_GROSS_ASSETS_BASE_AM accountGrossAssets, bal.MNY_MKT_FUND_BAL_AM moneyMarketFund, bal.TOT_DEBT_AM debt, bal.MRGN_EQTY_PT equity, bal.BOND_BAL_AM bond, bal.MFUND_BAL_AM mutualFund,
bal.EQTY_MKTVAL_SHRT_AM equilyMarketValueShort,
bal.EQTY_MKTVAL_LNG_AM equilyMarketValueLong,
bal.HI_CNC_SCRTY_INTRL_ID security, bal.HI_CNC_SCRTY_VAL_AM marketValueLong
from [mantas].[ACCT] acc left join [mantas].[ACCT_ADDR] addr on(acc.ACCT_INTRL_ID = addr.ACCT_INTRL_ID) left join [mantas].[ACCT_BAL_POSN_SMRY] bal on acc.ACCT_INTRL_ID = bal.ACCT_INTRL_ID where acc.ACCT_INTRL_ID = #{accountId}

select TOP 1 cu.CUST_INTRL_ID customerID, cu.ALIAS_NM customerName, aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID accountId, aa.ACCT_DSPLY_NM accountName, aa.ACCT_TYPE1_CD type1, aa.ACCT_TYPE2_CD type2, aa.ACCT_STAT_DT registration, aa.ACCT_TAX_ID taxId, aa.ACCT_OPEN_DT openDate, aa.LAST_ACTVY_DT lastActivity, aa.DMCLD_BRCH_CD branch,
aa.ACCT_STAT_CD effective,
aa.ACCT_CUST_LIST_SRC_CD list, aa.ACCT_BUS_RISK_NB business, aa.ACCT_GEO_RISK_NB grography, aa.ACCT_CUST_RISK_NB customer,
aba.DATA_DUMP_DT date, aba.NET_WRTH_AM accountNetWorth, aba.UNCOL_BAL_AM uncollectedBalance, aba.ACCT_GROSS_ASSETS_BASE_AM accountGrossAssets,
aba.TOT_DEBT_AM debt, aba.MRGN_EQTY_PT equity, aba.BOND_BAL_AM bond, aba.MFUND_BAL_AM mutualFund, aba.MRGN_BAL_AM marginBalance,
aba.LAST_OVR_DRFT_NEG_BAL_DT lastOverdraftDate, aba.OVR_DRFT_BAL_AM lastOverdraftBalance
from [mantas].[ACCT_ARC] aa left join [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] ca on ca.ACCT_INTRL_ID = aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID left join [mantas].[CUST_ARC] cu on cu.CUST_INTRL_ID = ca.CUST_INTRL_ID left join [mantas].[ACCT_BAL_POSN_SMRY_ARC] aba on aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID = aba.ACCT_INTRL_ID and Datename(year,aba.DATA_DUMP_DT) = Datename(year,DATEADD(MONTH,convert(int,isnull(#{month},0)),GETDATE())) and Datename(month,aba.DATA_DUMP_DT) = Datename(month,DATEADD(MONTH,convert(int,isnull(#{month},0)),GETDATE())) where aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID = #{accountId}

select TOP 1
aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID accountId, aba.DATA_DUMP_DT date, aba.NET_WRTH_AM accountNetWorth, aba.UNCOL_BAL_AM uncollectedBalance, aba.ACCT_GROSS_ASSETS_BASE_AM accountGrossAssets,
aba.TOT_DEBT_AM debt, aba.MRGN_EQTY_PT equity, aba.BOND_BAL_AM bond, aba.MFUND_BAL_AM mutualFund, aba.MRGN_BAL_AM marginBalance,
aba.LAST_OVR_DRFT_NEG_BAL_DT lastOverdraftDate, aba.OVR_DRFT_BAL_AM lastOverdraftBalance
from [mantas].[ACCT_ARC] aa left join [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] ca on ca.ACCT_INTRL_ID = aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID left join [mantas].[CUST_ARC] cu on cu.CUST_INTRL_ID = ca.CUST_INTRL_ID left join [mantas].[ACCT_BAL_POSN_SMRY_ARC] aba on aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID = aba.ACCT_INTRL_ID and Datename(year,aba.DATA_DUMP_DT) = Datename(year,DATEADD(MONTH,convert(int,isnull(#{month},0)*(-1)),GETDATE())) and Datename(month,aba.DATA_DUMP_DT) = Datename(month,DATEADD(MONTH,convert(int,isnull(#{month},0)*(-1)),GETDATE())) where aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID = #{accountId}

SELECT aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID accountId, aa.ACCT_TYPE1_CD type, aa.ACCT_TYPE2_CD type2 FROM [mantas].[KDD_REVIEW] kr LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] ca ON (kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID = ca.CUST_INTRL_ID AND kr.CNTRY_ID = '113000004') LEFT JOIN [mantas].[ACCT] aa ON (aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID = ( CASE kr.CNTRY_ID WHEN '113000002' THEN kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID WHEN '113000004' THEN ca.ACCT_INTRL_ID END )) WHERE aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID IS NOT NULL AND kr.REVIEW_ID = #{originalId}

SELECT sm.MNTH_SMRY_START_DT periodStartDate, sm.TOT_DEPST_AM totalDeposits, sm.CASH_TRXN_IN_AM incomingCash FROM [mantas].[ACCT_SMRY_MNTH] sm WHERE sm.ACCT_INTRL_ID = #{accountId} ORDER BY sm.MNTH_SMRY_START_DT DESC

SELECT sm.MNTH_SMRY_START_DT periodStartDate, sm.TOT_DEPST_AM totalDeposits, sm.CASH_TRXN_IN_AM incomingCash FROM [mantas].[ACCT_SMRY_MNTH_ARC] sm WHERE sm.ACCT_INTRL_ID = #{accountId} ORDER BY sm.MNTH_SMRY_START_DT DESC

SELECT aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID accountId, aa.ACCT_DSPLY_NM accountName, aa.ACCT_TYPE1_CD type1, aa.ACCT_TYPE2_CD type2, aa.ACCT_STAT_DT registration, aa.MANTAS_ACCT_BUS_TYPE_CD ownerType, aa.ACCT_STAT_CD status, aa.DMCLD_BRCH_CD branch,
aa.DATA_DUMP_DT updatedOn FROM [mantas].[KDD_REVIEW] kr LEFT JOIN [mantas].[CUST_ACCT] ca ON (kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID = ca.CUST_INTRL_ID AND kr.CNTRY_ID = '113000004') LEFT JOIN [mantas].[ACCT_ARC] aa ON (aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID = ( CASE kr.CNTRY_ID WHEN '113000002' THEN kr.CNTRY_KEY_ID WHEN '113000004' THEN ca.ACCT_INTRL_ID END )) WHERE aa.ACCT_INTRL_ID IS NOT NULL AND kr.REVIEW_ID = #{originalId}
select a.original_id from alert_info a where a.alert_id = #{alertId} and a.original_id is not null and a.is_deleted = 0 order by a.alert_id
select c.original_id from case_info c where c.case_id = #{caseId} and c.original_id is not null and c.is_deleted = 0 order by c.case_id
